sentences.en: a prototype system which produces 25 kilowatts of power
sentences.cn: 一个生产25千瓦电量的样机

sentences.en: Devices called kilowatt - hour meters are used to measure this intangible electrical energy delivered to customers.
sentences.cn: 称为千瓦时表(电度表)的表计就用来计量这种供给用户的无形电能.

sentences.en: Hyundai a 30 - kilowatt electric motor between the 169 - horsepower, 2.4 - liter gasoline engine and a six - speed automatic transmission.
sentences.cn: 现代在一部2.4升169马力的汽油发动机和一具六档自动变速箱之间装备了一部30千瓦的电动机.

sentences.en: It creates four times more jobs per kilowatt hour generated than fossil fuel such as coal.
sentences.cn: 它每千瓦时能产生相当于煤等固体燃料四倍的能量.

sentences.en: The customer cannot directly detect a kilowatt - hour with any of his physical senses.
sentences.cn: 用户不能用人体感官直接察觉千瓦时的用电量.

sentences.en: The most important advantage of the gasoline engine is its lower weight per kilowatt.
sentences.cn: 汽油机最重要的优点是每千瓦的质量较轻.

sentences.en: The watt is a small unit of power so that we use the kilowatt instead.
sentences.cn: 瓦特是小功率的单位,因此我们用千瓦代之.

sentences.en: They pay thirty fen per kilowatt hour.
To reach the 100 kilowatt target, the laser will require six modules.
sentences.cn: 为了达到100千瓦目标, 激光发生器将要求有六个模块.

sentences.en: Wave energy right now we are estimating is around fifty cents a kilowatt an hour.
sentences.cn: 据我们估计,海浪能达到每小时50千瓦左右.

sentences.en: We saves every blob and kilowatt - hour today in order to weight our customers in the market.
sentences.cn: 今天我们节省一滴水、一度电,明天客户就多一份立足、竞争的砝码.

sentences.en: Where the watt is too small a unit, we many use the kilowatt.
sentences.cn: 在用瓦作单位嫌太小的情况下, 我们用千瓦.

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring electrical power, equal to 1,000 watts
